text: so at Nika this is a short and sweet
version of dough or breakfast rice
porridge the link to the full version
with all the details is in the
description let's get started for the
seasoned pork in a food processor
combine ground pork soy sauce fish sauce
white pepper and sugar oh and an ice
cube
and process until a fine fine paste for
the rice base bring some water to a boil
and then add broken or regular rice and
let it cook when it starts to thicken
you want to stir it constantly until
very thick and the rice grains are
broken down to your liking set this
aside for now now for the egg put a
room-temperature egg into a bowl then
slowly pour hot water into the bowl
until the egg is completely submerged
let it sit for 10 minutes and then chuck
it in some cold water to put it all
together bring some pork stock to a boil
for the pork stock recipe you can click
on the link below now at the ground pork
we made earlier in chunks season the
stock with soy sauce and a little salt
then once the Park is halfway done at
the rice base stir until the rice is
well mixed and the pork is done to serve
crack the egg into the serving bowl and
it should look nice and jiggly like this
then top it off with our dough garnish
with some white pepper green onions and
julienned ginger and that is it
happy breakfast for the full recipe with
all the details you can click right here
or in the link below if you enjoy the
show please click to subscribe
and I will see you next time pop queen
car
you
you
